ComicInfo.Summary:
"Dead Man's Hand", Part Two
Bobby Pope, psychic and con artist, is recruited by Detective Theodore Irvine of the Denver PD for a 'simple' job. When things go wrong and the job turns into a shootout, Bobby becomes a witness?and a liability. On the run, Bobby turns to the one person who may be able to save him, if she doesn't kill him first.
ComicInfo.Title: Snapshots Part 1; Dead Man's Hand
